name: anime-watch-parties
description: Watch your favorite anime on Crunchyroll, Funimation or Wakanim with your friends.

scripts.browserify-background-scripts: mkdir -p built/src/background-scripts/ && cd src/background-scripts/ && browserify --debug --plugin [ tsify ] clientScript.ts | exorcist ../../built/src/background-scripts/background-script.js.map > ../../built/src/background-scripts/background-script.js
scripts.browserify-web-accessible-resources: mkdir -p built/src/web-accessible-resources/js/ && cd src/web-accessible-resources/js/ && browserify --debug --plugin [ tsify ] tabScript.ts | exorcist ../../../built/src/web-accessible-resources/js/script.js.map > ../../../built/src/web-accessible-resources/js/script.js
scripts.release: npm run browserify-background-scripts && npm run browserify-web-accessible-resources && ./concat.ps1 && mkdir -p built/Release/Firefox/ && zip -r -FS built/Release/Firefox/Anime-Watch-Parties.xpi LICENSE manifest.json src/icons/* src/dependencies/* built/src/background-scripts/background-script.js built/src/background-scripts/background-script.js.map src/content-scripts/listener.js built/src/web-accessible-resources/js/script.js built/src/web-accessible-resources/js/script.js.map built/src/web-accessible-resources/css/script.css src/popup/*

author: Dragicafit
